statements.select:
SELECT news.Id AS ID_NEWS, news.Title AS TITLE_NEWS, news.Detail AS DETAIL_NEWS, news.AddDate AS ADDDATE_NEWS, news.Tags AS TAGS_NEWS, news.NewType AS NEWTYPE_NEWS, news.Publish AS PUBLISH_NEWS FROM news
news.Id = #Id#
news.Title = #Title#
news.Detail = #Detail#
news.AddDate = #Adddate#
news.Tags = #Tags#
news.NewType = #Newtype#
news.Publish = #Publish#

SELECT news.Id AS ID_NEWS, news.Title AS TITLE_NEWS, news.Detail AS DETAIL_NEWS, news.AddDate AS ADDDATE_NEWS, news.Tags AS TAGS_NEWS, news.NewType AS NEWTYPE_NEWS, news.Publish AS PUBLISH_NEWS FROM news WHERE news.Id = #value#

SELECT news.Id AS ID_NEWS, news.Title AS TITLE_NEWS, news.Detail AS DETAIL_NEWS, news.AddDate AS ADDDATE_NEWS, news.Tags AS TAGS_NEWS, news.NewType AS NEWTYPE_NEWS, news.Publish AS PUBLISH_NEWS ,news_type.Id AS ID_NEWS_TYPE, news_type.Name AS NAME_NEWS_TYPE, news_type.Type AS TYPE_NEWS_TYPE FROM news LEFT JOIN news_type ON news.NewType = news_type.Id
news.Id = #Id#
news.Title like '%$Title$%'
news.Detail = #Detail#
news.AddDate = #Adddate#
news.Tags = #Tags#
news.NewType = #Newtype#
news.Publish = #Publish#

SELECT news.Id AS ID_NEWS, news.Title AS TITLE_NEWS, news.Detail AS DETAIL_NEWS, news.AddDate AS ADDDATE_NEWS, news.Tags AS TAGS_NEWS, news.NewType AS NEWTYPE_NEWS, news.Publish AS PUBLISH_NEWS ,news_type.Id AS ID_NEWS_TYPE, news_type.Name AS NAME_NEWS_TYPE, news_type.Type AS TYPE_NEWS_TYPE FROM news LEFT JOIN news_type ON news.NewType = news_type.Id WHERE news.Id = #value#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO news (Id, Title, Detail, AddDate, Tags, NewType, Publish) VALUES(#Id#, #Title#, #Detail#, #Adddate#, #Tags#, #Newtype#, #Publish#)
statements.update: UPDATE news SET Id = #Id#, Title = #Title#, Detail = #Detail#, AddDate = #Adddate#, Tags = #Tags#, NewType = #Newtype#, Publish = #Publish# WHERE news.Id = #IdOld#
